casebody.data:
E. BROOKS WILKINS FAMILY MEDICINE, P.A.
v.
WAKEMED; WakeMed d/b/a Falls Pointe Medical Group ; Inam Rashid, MD ; Michele Casey, MD; Monica Oei, MD ; and Leslie Robinson, MD No. 41P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 John M. Kirby, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for E. Brooks Wilkins Family Medicine, P.A. William R. Forstner, Attorney at Law, Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for WakeMed, et al. Julian H. Wright, Jr., Attorney at Law, Andrew A. Kasper, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Rashid, Inam (MD), et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of February 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
